name: .Bouncr.
description:
Infinite platforms spawn as the player jumps from platform to platform.  But be careful, the water is rising and cannons are threatening your game.  Beat your previous score by getting higher than you did before.

(This game is in development, updates are coming and the ultimate goal is to publish as an app for mobile :).  Let me know about any bugs, I'll look into em)

(Thanks Pixel Frog for the assets ;))
